featured_collection_AcreQA.name: t:sections.featured_collection.name

settings.rich_text: Happie Fungi Fusion is where ancient plant wisdom meets modern refreshment. Each sparkling can blends adaptogenic mushrooms and ocean minerals with bold, juicy flavors—delivering clean energy, focus, and calm, all with next-level bioavailability and a taste you’ll crave.

settings.title: Lion’s Mane Mushroom
settings.subheading: 900mg/can Lion’s Mane is well-known for supporting mental clarity, focus, and overall cognitive function. Celebrated for its ability to boost brain health, this mushroom helps you stay sharp whether you’re working, studying, or deep in a creative flow.

settings.title: Cordyceps Mushroom
settings.subheading: Dual-ExtractedCordyceps delivers clean, sustained energy while supporting physical performance. By helping your body use oxygen more efficiently, it has become a favorite for athletes, movers, and anyone who needs a natural boost throughout the day.

settings.title: Reishi Mushroom
settings.subheading: Dual-ExtractedOften called the “queen of mushrooms,” Reishi promotes calm, resilience, and immune support. It helps your body adapt to stress, encouraging balance and a steady mood in the face of life’s daily demands.

settings.title: Ocean Minerals
settings.subheading: 230mg Magnesium, 90mg Calcium per canPacked with magnesium and calcium sourced from pure ocean water, these minerals hydrate and support muscle recovery. They help replenish electrolytes to keep you feeling your best, whether before a workout, after, or anytime your body needs a reset.

settings.title: Delicious, Real Flavors
settings.text: Enjoy sunshine-bright Mango Mimosa, nostalgic Blue Razzberry, and juicy Watermelon—crafted with real fruit and no artificial junk.

settings.title: Clean, Plant-Based, and Powerful
settings.text: Non-GMO, vegan, and free from anything artificial—just pure, functional goodness in every can.

settings.title: Functional Benefits You Can Feel
settings.text: Lion’s Mane for mental clarity, Cordyceps for clean, sustained energy, and Reishi for calm and resilience—each dual-extracted for 3–5x better bioavailability and maximum impact.

settings.title: Bioavailability That Works
settings.text: Dual-extracted mushrooms and premium minerals mean your body absorbs the benefits quickly—so you get more out of every sip.

settings.title: Health-Forward Hydration
settings.text: Ocean-derived magnesium and calcium support muscle recovery, hydration, and all-day vitality.

settings.title: Anytime, Anywhere Boost
settings.text: Perfect for work, workouts, or winding down, Fungi Fusion fits seamlessly into your daily routine for balanced energy and focus without the crash.

settings.title: Why You’ll Love Happie Fungi Fusion

settings.quote: Smells amazing. Skin feels soft, moisturized.
After two weeks of reliciously using it, my skin is more supple than it was before.
I love it! I always wake up with hydrated and soft skin the next day.

settings.title: Love Fungi Fusion? Try THC Infused!
settings.subheading: Elevate your social sipping with Happie THC Beverages—made for those who crave bold flavor, real effects, and a touch of wellness. Each can delivers a crisp, refreshing taste paired with a smooth, fast-acting buzz that’s perfectly balanced for any occasion. Relax, connect, and enjoy the moment—without the hangover or the regret.
